name: Orbital Strike Package Tactics
description: Tactical planning reps for orchestrating multi-vector strikes, debris-field maneuvers, and synchronized effects in contested orbits.

cards.title: Multi-Axis Timing Stack
cards.description: Sequence three maneuver elements to hit a target window within ±30 seconds despite comms latency.
cards.summaryText: Multi-axis strikes fail when timing discipline slips.

cards.title: Debris Corridor Weaving
cards.description: Plan a strike path through a congested debris field using only blue-force propulsion margins.
cards.summaryText: Tacticians rehearse debris weaving before combat forces them to.

cards.title: Counter-Adversary Jamming
cards.description: Build a strike comms plan that survives worst-case jamming by layering optical, RF, and store-and-forward relays.
cards.summaryText: No comms plan survives first contact unless you build backups into the package.

cards.title: ROE Crosswalk
cards.description: Rehearse how rules of engagement apply when maneuvers transit commercial slots or allied constellations.
cards.summaryText: ROE literacy prevents tactical pauses once the package is airborne.

cards.title: Abort Tree Drill
cards.description: Construct an explicit abort tree covering comms loss, propulsion faults, and adversary counter-maneuvers.
bulletpoints: Define criteria for each abort branch
cards.summaryText: Abort trees are tactical confidence—everyone knows the exits.

cards.title: Synchronized Fires Inject
cards.description: Integrate cyber or terrestrial fires enablers into the orbital strike package and rehearse the message flow.
cards.summaryText: Orbital tacticians must speak the fires cell language for real integration.
